resources.string:
1: Enter the height for an image.
2: Enter Width for image.
3: Click on Generate button to fetch the image
4: Click on the saved list button to see images stored.
1: Select the category from the drop down. 2: Enter number of questions to attempt. 3: Start the quiz
1: Click on submit to finish the quiz.\n2: click on cancel to cancel the quiz.
1: Click on save button to save the results to the database.\n2: Click on scoreboard button to see list of 10 top scores.

1: Click on any of the score to display more details.
2: Long click on any item to delete it from the database.
4: Click on the <-- Arrow above to go back to main page.
5: Click on the Home button at the bottom to go back to the main page.
Select the category from the options below

"1.Input a number
 2.Pick a currency (from)
3.Pick a currency (to)
" "4.Click CONVERT to make a conversion
 5.click on it, then click on the save button to save
" "6.Long click on it, if you wanna delete
 7. click on saved list, to show you the currencies you saved."
Do you want to delete this currency conversion?
